SourceString: A Magos is master of secret magics, including witchcraft, and knows how to ward against them.
Light robes woven of fine cloth, embroidered with magical symbols.
Light armor offering maximum mobility, favored by thieves and skirmishers.
Fashioned after the armor of the royal guard of Sparta to offer protection against divine magic.
Favored by well-armored cavalry for deflecting arrows and absorbing sword strikes.
A soldier\'s kit. Provides a good mix of protection and freedom of movement.
Scuffed and scratched but strong as ever.
Amber is imported from far-off northern lands.
Worth enough to pay for a burial.
Cold and rough to the touch.
The amber has a comforting weight.
